mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ssm.t_user WHERE username = #{arg0} AND password = #{arg1}
SELECT * FROM ssm.t_user WHERE username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{username}, '%')

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ssm.t_user (username, password, age, gender, email) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{email});
mapper.update: UPDATE ssm.t_user SET username = #{username}, password = #{password}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, email = #{email} WHERE id = #{id}
